FuncDef: The reset mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet command clears information about ND dual-fed packets.
CLIs: reset mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet [ interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect information about ND dual-fed packets within a specific period of time, run the reset mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet command to clear the existing ND dual-fed packet information and then run the display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface command to view the current information about ND dual-fed packets. If the interface parameter is specified, the information only about the specified interface is cleared. If the interface parameter is not specified, information about all interfaces is cleared.
